From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
* Isabelle/jEdit Prover IDE *

  • The jEdit status line includes a widget for Isabelle/ML heap usage,
    including an indication for ongoing garbage collection (as "ML
    cleanup").

  • The Monitor dockable provides buttons to request a full garbage
    collection and sharing of live data on the ML heap. It also includes
    information about the Java Runtime system.

This refers to Isabelle/510ebf846696, which also contains some snippets of
documentation.

The monitoring is based on recent changes in Poly/ML by David Mattews. We can
now see better how the every growing applications make use of memory
resources, and potentially avoid exhausting them too early.

Makarius
